participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: A bit rebellious and carefree, enjoys skating and hanging out with friends.
participant_1.background: i'm always wearing a hat. i've a broken arm. my favourite skater is rob dryden. my friends are all skateboarders.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Optimistic and adventurous, loves nature and has a vibrant personality.
participant_2.background: my favorite color is orange. i just broke up with boyfriend two months ago. i turned 18 years old yesterday. i like to go hiking in the mornings to see the sunset. i have a pet fish.

content.text: Alright mate? I like to skateboard and play with my friends.
What do you think about ConvAI competition?
Do you like to be an assessor?
